channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for HI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for HI

item.title: Report I-2025030040
item.description:
Report I-2025030040

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-23T00:57:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-16
  • City: HONOLULU
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED AIRLINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: We were notified of an undeclared shipment from HNL-IAH on 03/16/2025. The undeclared items were UN3481 lithium batteries packed with equipment. Four batteries were found.
